article.title: SAIC Awarded $158 Million Task Order by Defense Health Information Management System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Science Applications International Corporation (SAIC) has been awarded a task order by the Defense Health Information Management System to provide sustainment support to the Armed Forces Health Longitudinal Technology Application/Composite Health Care System. The order has a total value of more than $158 million if all options are exercised.
